name: Detain
description:
Submission to My First Game Jam Winter: 2021.

(made in 2 weeks)

Detain is a 2.5D platformer set in a derelict facility. You play as a robot, having been let out of containment you make your way through the factory, slowly revealing the nature of the place you find yourself in.

Defiantly over scoped, but somewhat functional. Missing a few animations and sound effects, but the core gameplay mechanics are there.
